name: superintensity
content:
superintensity noun [U]
(POWER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being extremely intense (= felt strongly or having a very strong effect): This paper examines the superintensity of tropical cyclones. Everything started to burn with savage superintensity.
More examplesFewer examplesThe project aims to make an evaluation of hurricane superintensity. The typhoon continued at super-intensity for two days before winds fell. These super-intensity lasers are used in nuclear reactors.

superintensity noun [U]
(STRONG EMOTION)
the quality of being very serious and having extremely strong emotions: What made them similar was their shared superintensity. He was moved by the superintensity of people's feelings.
